column1: It's $200 000 if you want to go through here!
You can't go to Saffron City without paying the toll. That's the rule!
column2: No se puede entrar a Ciudad Azafrán sin pagar. ¡Reglas son reglas!

column1: \GIt's $10 000 if you want to go through here!
Of course the toll is a lie.
column2: Claro que lo del peaje es falso.

column1: But I'm defenseless, I can't do anything about it!
column2: ¡Pero estoy indefenso, no puedo hacer nada al respecto!

column1: The way to Saffron City is clear now! The toll was a lie made up by Team Rocket.
column2: ¡Ya se puede ir a Ciudad Azafrán! Ese peaje fue una farsa creada por el Team Rocket.

column1: It seems like Team Rocket has taken over Saffron City. They're not letting anyone in!
column2: Parece que el Team Rocket ha tomado el control de Ciudad Azafrán. ¡No dejan entrar a nadie!

column1: Come on, help me take care of this!
Boss isn't going to be happy when he hears about this, no he won't!
column2: ¡Cuando el jefe se entere de esto, no va a estar nada contento!

column1: Let's go, before it's too late. Let's meet up at Silph Co!
column2: Vamos rápido, antes de que pase algo. Nos reunimos en Silph Co.
